snippet: A Super Bowl promotion costs one business owner $600,000 in free furniture. Manufacturing surges, home prices rise, and Mark Zuckerberg offers lessons in entrepreneurship. Will you notice when the Postal Service stops delivering on Saturdays?
abstract: A Super Bowl promotion costs one business owner $600,000 in free furniture. Manufacturing surges, home prices rise, and Mark Zuckerberg offers lessons in entrepreneurship. Will you notice when the Postal Service stops delivering on Saturdays?

headline.main: This Week in Small Business: Free Furniture!
